types.name: personal
types.description: Fireworks intended for recreational use during holiday celebrations

types.name: Buildings
types.description: These babies will break down the Taj Mahal

types.name: Implosion
types.description: Strategic placing of explosive material and timing of its detonation so that a structure collapses on itself in a matter of seconds, minimizing the physical damage to its immediate surroundings.

types.name: Black
types.description: First known type of gunpowder, is a mixture of potassium nitrate more commonly known as saltpeter, carbon in the form of charcoal, and sulfur with a ratio (by weight) of approximately 15:3:2 respectively.

types.name: Smokeless
types.description: Developed as a cleaner burning substitute to black powder

types.name: Contemporary
types.description: Advanced type of gunpowder that doesn't burn making for infinite use, as long as ammo is available.
